code: import store from"./store";export var round=function round(min,max){return Math.round(Math.random()*(max-min)+min);};export var monsterArray=[{name:'bat',pvMax:100,manaMax:30,dommage_min:3,dommage_max:7,special_min:10,special_max:15,heal:10},{name:'arka',pvMax:120,manaMax:50,dommage_min:5,dommage_max:9,special_min:12,special_max:17,heal:14},{name:'asmode',pvMax:150,manaMax:80,dommage_min:7,dommage_max:11,special_min:15,special_max:20,heal:18},{name:'astarte',pvMax:180,manaMax:100,dommage_min:10,dommage_max:14,special_min:17,special_max:22,heal:22},{name:'axolam',pvMax:210,manaMax:120,dommage_min:12,dommage_max:16,special_min:19,special_max:23,heal:24},{name:'dragoonTroll',pvMax:230,manaMax:150,dommage_min:15,dommage_max:19,special_min:21,special_max:26,heal:27},{name:'golum',pvMax:260,manaMax:170,dommage_min:17,dommage_max:21,special_min:23,special_max:28,heal:30},{name:'killy',pvMax:290,manaMax:200,dommage_min:20,dommage_max:24,special_min:27,special_max:33,heal:33},{name:'oger',pvMax:350,manaMax:220,dommage_min:22,dommage_max:27,special_min:29,special_max:34,heal:40}];export var moving=function moving(elementToMove,functionName,delai,whoAction){var playerDiv=document.getElementById(store.getState().gamerName);var monsterDiv=document.getElementById(store.getState().monsterName);var playerred=document.getElementById("red-".concat(store.getState().gamerName));var monsterred=document.getElementById("red-".concat(store.getState().monsterName));var start=Date.now();var timer=setInterval(function(){var timePassed=Date.now()-start;if(timePassed>=delai){clearInterval(timer);setTimeout(function(){if(functionName=='heal'){elementToMove.style.visibility='hidden';}var whoIsred=whoAction=='player'?monsterred:playerred;var whoIsTouch=whoAction=='player'?monsterDiv:playerDiv;whoIsTouch.style.display='none';whoIsred.style.display='inherit';setTimeout(function(){whoIsTouch.style.display='inherit';whoIsred.style.display='none';},50);},100);}if(functionName=="draw"){draw(timePassed,delai,elementToMove,whoAction);}if(functionName=="fireBall"){fireBall(timePassed,delai,elementToMove,whoAction);}if(functionName=="heal"){heal(timePassed,delai,elementToMove,whoAction);}},20);};function draw(timePassed,delai,elementToMove,whoAction){if(timePassed>=delai){setTimeout(function(){elementToMove.style.left='inherit';elementToMove.style.right='inherit';},1);}if(whoAction=='player'){elementToMove.style.left=timePassed/1.5+'px';}if(whoAction='monster'){elementToMove.style.right=timePassed/1.5+'px';}}function fireBall(timePassed,delai,elementToMove,whoAction){var playerDiv=document.getElementById(store.getState().gamerName);var monsterDiv=document.getElementById(store.getState().monsterName);var imageToMove;whoAction=='player'?imageToMove=playerDiv:imageToMove=monsterDiv;if(timePassed>=delai){setTimeout(function(){elementToMove.style.height="400px";whoAction=='player'?imageToMove.style.right='inherit':imageToMove.style.left='inherit';whoAction=='player'?elementToMove.style.left='10rem':elementToMove.style.right='-14rem';imageToMove.style.bottom='inherit';elementToMove.style.height='0px';},1);}if(timePassed<100){imageToMove.style.bottom=timePassed/2+'px';if(whoAction=='player'){imageToMove.style.right=timePassed/1.25+'px';imageToMove.style.transform="rotate(".concat(360-timePassed/30,")");}else if(whoAction=='monster'){imageToMove.style.left=timePassed/1.25+'px';imageToMove.style.transform="rotate(".concat(timePassed/30,")");}}else if(timePassed>100&&timePassed<200){imageToMove.style.bottom=-timePassed/7+'px';if(whoAction=='player'){imageToMove.style.right=timePassed/1.25+'px';imageToMove.style.transform="rotate(".concat(timePassed/30,")");}else if(whoAction=='monster'){imageToMove.style.left=timePassed/1.25+'px';imageToMove.style.transform="rotate(".concat(360-timePassed/30,")");}}else if(timePassed>300){elementToMove.style.visibility='visible';if(elementToMove.clientHeight<=70){elementToMove.style.height=timePassed/10+'px';}else if(elementToMove.clientHeight>70){if(whoAction=='player'){elementToMove.style.left=10+timePassed/25+'rem';}else if(whoAction=='monster'){elementToMove.style.right=-14+timePassed/25+'rem';}}}}function heal(timePassed,delai,elementToMove,whoAction){elementToMove.style.visibility='visible';elementToMove.style.transform="rotate(".concat(timePassed,"deg)");}
